plurals.name: bill_cap_info_dialog_description_full_speed_summary
plurals.item:
"Full-speed data has been restored for %1$s members of your group for %2$s.
Data becomes free after your group uses %3$s, but slows down for any member who uses over %4$s."

"Full-speed data has been restored for %1$s member of your group for %2$s.
Data becomes free after your group uses %3$s, but slows down for any member who uses over %4$s."

plurals.name: billcap_item3_desc
plurals.item: "Data is %2$s. After %3$s, it's on us — so your group of %1$d will never spend over %4$s on data per cycle."
"Data is %2$s. After %3$s, it's on us — so as an individual, you'll never spend over %4$s on data per cycle."

plurals.name: data_cap_caption_other_unthrottled
plurals.item: "You'll be able to set a data budget for %1$s when your next cycle starts in %2$d days."
"You'll be able to set a data budget for %1$s when your next cycle starts in %2$d day."

plurals.name: data_cap_caption_self_unthrottled
plurals.item: "You'll be able to set a data budget when your next cycle starts in %1$d days."
"You'll be able to set a data budget when your next cycle starts in %1$d day."

plurals.name: data_only_sim_bill_cap_group_cap
plurals.item: No extra costs — just pay for the data your group uses up to %1$s for a group of %2$d

plurals.name: data_only_sim_bill_cap_group_rate_cap
plurals.item: No extra costs — just pay %1$s for the data you use up to %2$s for a group of %3$d

plurals.name: device_insurance_body_unnamed_devices
plurals.item: Do you want to continue device protection for %1$d devices?
Do you want to continue device protection for %1$d device?

plurals.name: intro_step_2
plurals.item: Ship your phone using our prepaid envelope within %d days
Ship your phone using our prepaid envelope within %d day

plurals.name: intro_step_3
plurals.item: "We'll review it within %d days and credit you its value"
"We'll review it within %d day and credit you its value"

plurals.name: pay_off_devices_body_step_one
plurals.item: Schedule payoff of the existing balance on one or more of your devices:
Schedule payoff of the existing balance on:

plurals.name: plan_switch_changes_body_garnet_sim
plurals.item:
Up to %1$d data‑only SIMs are supported
Any extra data‑only SIMs will be deactivated and removed.

Up to %1$d data‑only SIM is supported
Any extra data‑only SIMs will be deactivated and removed.

plurals.name: plan_switch_garnet_description_prorated_days
plurals.item: "Heads up! For the rest of this cycle, you'll be on the %1$s plan. To cover the price difference for those %4$d days, you'll get a one‑time charge of approximately %3$s on your next bill. After that, you'll pay %2$s/﻿month."

"Heads up! For the rest of this cycle, you'll be on the %1$s plan. To cover the price difference for that day, you'll get a one‑time charge of approximately %3$s on your next bill. After that, you'll pay %2$s/﻿month."

plurals.name: referral_contest_over_header_desc
plurals.item: "Thanks for participating! We'll be in touch about your gifts. You can still earn %1$s Fi credit for your active referrals by sharing your unique referral code."
"Thanks for participating! We'll be in touch about your gift. You can still earn %1$s Fi credit for your active referrals by sharing your unique referral code."

plurals.name: referral_contest_over_header_desc_deadline
plurals.item: "Thanks for participating! We'll be in touch about your gifts. You can still earn %1$s Fi credit for your active referrals by sharing your unique referral code. They'll need to use their referral code before %2$s."

"Thanks for participating! We'll be in touch about your gift. You can still earn %1$s Fi credit for your active referrals by sharing your unique referral code. They'll need to use their referral code before %2$s."

plurals.name: referral_contest_over_header_desc_fallback
plurals.item: "Thanks for participating! We'll be in touch about your gifts. You can still earn Fi credit for your active referrals by sharing your unique referral code."
"Thanks for participating! We'll be in touch about your gift. You can still earn Fi credit for your active referrals by sharing your unique referral code."

plurals.name: term_financing
plurals.item: "You'll be billed for the remaining balance owed on your phones."
"You'll be billed for the remaining balance owed on your phone."

plurals.name: term_financing_balance
plurals.item: "You'll be billed for the remaining %1$s balance owed on your phones."
"You'll be billed for the remaining %1$s balance owed on your phone."

plurals.name: term_financing_balance_group
plurals.item: "You'll be billed for the remaining %1$s balance owed on your group's phones."
"You'll be billed for the remaining %1$s balance owed on your group's phone."

plurals.name: term_financing_group
plurals.item: "You'll be billed for the remaining balance owed on your group's phones."
"You'll be billed for the remaining balance owed on your group's phone."

plurals.name: term_plan_unlimited
plurals.item: "On future bills, you'll pay %1$s for the %2$s remaining people on your plan (%3$s/person)."
"On future bills, you'll pay %1$s total for just yourself."

plurals.name: troubleshooting_fixing_misconfiguration
plurals.item: Take action on the items below

plurals.item: Your current cycle ends in %1$d days
